text: The 2016/17 FIS Nordic Combined World Cup was the 34th World Cup season, organized by the International Ski Federation. It started on 26 November 2016 in Ruka, Finland and ended on 19 March 2017 in Schonach, Germany. == Calendar == === Men === {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="background:#fff; font-size:86%;
